hook.text: Habitat loss is the number one driver of extinction. It isn't even close.

buildup.text: Forests become farms. Wetlands become malls. Grasslands become suburbs.

discovery.text: When habitat fragments, small isolated populations lose genetic diversity and die out.

climax.text: We have converted over 75% of ice-free land for human use. Only 25% remains wild.

punchline.text: Species don't go extinct in the wild. The wild goes extinct around them.
